name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Incognito Mail - Disposable temporary email addresses

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create temporary disposable email address. Protect your email from spam and keep your main inbox clean.

incognitomail.co provides temporary, secure, anonymous, free, disposable email address.

This is a helper extension for our web service incognitomail.co. Using this extension get all your temporary emails with one click on any site. Use this along with our main website to get additional features like custom domain and creating your personal id

This extension is similar to services like  10minutemail, mailinator, temp mail and others.
